languages.text: "Но не из одного мрачного разрушения сложен наш дух. Вкус веселья ведом нам не хуже вкуса битвы. В чертоге героев мы устраиваем пиры, каких не найти нигде. Под гремящий смех поднимаем мы рога, рассказываем саги и чествуем героев".

"But there is more to our spirit than grim destruction alone. In the hall of heroes, we hold feasts the likes of which you will see nowhere else. To thundering laughter, we raise our horns, tell our sagas, and honour our glorious fallen."
languages.original_text: "Но не из одного мрачного разрушения сложен наш дух. Вкус веселья ведом нам не хуже вкуса битвы. В чертоге героев мы устраиваем пиры, каких не найти нигде. Под гремящий смех поднимаем мы рога, рассказываем саги и чествуем героев".

traits.locale_text: "But there is more to our spirit than grim destruction alone. Our taste for fun is no less pronounced than our taste for battle. In the hall of heroes, we hold feasts the likes of which you will see nowhere else. To thundering laughter, we raise our horns, tell our sagas, and honour our glorious fallen."

"But there is more to our spirit than grim destruction alone. Our taste for fun is no less pronounced than our taste for battle. In the hall of heroes, we hold feasts the likes of which you will see nowhere else. To thundering laughter, we raise our horns, tell our sagas, and honour our glorious fallen."

"But there is more to our spirit than grim destruction alone. Our taste for fun is no less pronounced than our taste for battle. In the hall of heroes, we hold feasts the likes of which you will see nowhere else. To thundering laughter, we raise our horns, tell our sagas, and honour our glorious fallen."

"But there is more to our spirit than grim destruction alone. In the hall of heroes, we hold feasts the likes of which you will see nowhere else. To thundering laughter, we raise our horns, tell our sagas, and honour our glorious fallen."

languages.text: “不过，我们的精神寄托，并只有严酷的破坏。我们会在英雄殿堂里举办奢华的宴会，像那样的宴会，在其他地方根本找不到。在雷鸣般的大笑声中，我们会举起号杯，讲述我们的传奇史诗，纪念我们光荣的逝者。”
languages.original_text: "But there is more to our spirit than grim destruction alone. In the hall of heroes, we hold feasts the likes of which you will see nowhere else. To thundering laughter, we raise our horns, tell our sagas, and honour our glorious fallen."

traits.locale_text: “不过，我们的精神寄托，并只有严酷的破坏。我们对享乐的品位，并不亚于我们对战斗的品味。我们会在英雄殿堂里举办奢华的宴会，像那样的宴会，在其他地方根本找不到。在雷鸣般的大笑声中，我们会举起号杯，讲述我们的传奇史诗，纪念我们光荣的逝者。”

languages.text: «Pero en nuestro espíritu no solo hay destrucción sombría. En el salón de los héroes celebramos festejos como nunca verá en otro lugar. Entre risas atronadoras levantamos cuernos, contamos sagas y honramos a nuestros gloriosos hermanos caídos».
languages.original_text: "But there is more to our spirit than grim destruction alone. In the hall of heroes, we hold feasts the likes of which you will see nowhere else. To thundering laughter, we raise our horns, tell our sagas, and honour our glorious fallen."

traits.locale_text: «Pero en nuestro espíritu no solo hay destrucción sombría. Nuestras ansias de diversión son comparables a nuestras ansias de batalla. En el salón de los héroes celebramos festejos como nunca verá en otro lugar. Entre risas atronadoras levantamos cuernos, contamos sagas y honramos a nuestros gloriosos hermanos caídos».

languages.text: 「しかし、俺たちの精神に宿るのは残酷な破壊だけじゃあない。英雄の広間では、他では見られないような宴が催される。けたたましい笑いの中、俺達は角笛を掲げ、サーガを語り、栄光のうちに倒れし者たちを讃えるのさ」
languages.original_text: "But there is more to our spirit than grim destruction alone. In the hall of heroes, we hold feasts the likes of which you will see nowhere else. To thundering laughter, we raise our horns, tell our sagas, and honour our glorious fallen."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、俺たちの精神に宿るのは残酷な破壊だけじゃあない。俺たちの楽しみは、戦いに対する味わいに勝るとも劣らない。英雄の広間では、他では見られないような宴が催される。けたたましい笑いの中、俺達は角笛を掲げ、サーガを語り、栄光のうちに倒れし者たちを讃えるのさ」

languages.text: "Doch unser Geist besteht nicht allein aus dunkler Zerstörungswut. In den Hallen der Helden halten wir Feste ab, wie Ihr sie nirgendwo sonst findet. Zu donnerndem Gelächter erheben wir unsere Hörner, erzählen unsere Sagen und ehren unsere glorreichen Gefallenen."
languages.original_text: "But there is more to our spirit than grim destruction alone. In the hall of heroes, we hold feasts the likes of which you will see nowhere else. To thundering laughter, we raise our horns, tell our sagas, and honour our glorious fallen."

traits.locale_text: "Doch unser Geist besteht nicht allein aus dunkler Zerstörungswut. Unsere Gier nach Spaß ist nicht weniger ausgeprägt als unsere Gier nach Kampf. In den Hallen der Helden halten wir Feste ab, wie Ihr sie nirgendwo sonst findet. Zu donnerndem Gelächter erheben wir unsere Hörner, erzählen unsere Sagen und ehren unsere glorreichen Gefallenen."

languages.text: « Cela dit, nous affectionnons aussi d'autres choses que la pure et simple destruction. Dans la salle des héros, nous organisons des banquets qui dépassent de loin tous ceux que vous avez pu connaître. Nous rions à gorge déployée, levons nos cornes, contons nos sagas et honorons ceux qui sont tombés en se couvrant de gloire. »
languages.original_text: "But there is more to our spirit than grim destruction alone. In the hall of heroes, we hold feasts the likes of which you will see nowhere else. To thundering laughter, we raise our horns, tell our sagas, and honour our glorious fallen."

traits.locale_text: « Cela dit, nous affectionnons aussi d'autres choses que la pure et simple destruction. Notre goût du divertissement égale bien notre appétit pour les combats. Dans la salle des héros, nous organisons des banquets qui dépassent de loin tous ceux que vous avez pu connaître. Nous rions à gorge déployée, levons nos cornes, contons nos sagas et honorons ceux qui sont tombés en se couvrant de gloire. »

languages.original_text: "But there is more to our spirit than grim destruction alone. In the hall of heroes, we hold feasts the likes of which you will see nowhere else. To thundering laughter, we raise our horns, tell our sagas, and honour our glorious fallen."

languages.text: "Fakat ruhumuzda zalim yıkımdan daha fazlası vardır. Kahramanlar salonunda senin gibilerin hiçbir yerde göremeyeceği ziyafetler veririz. Gürleyen kahkahalarla boynuzlarımızı havaya kaldırıp destanlarımızı anlatır, şanlı ölülerimizi anarız."
languages.original_text: "But there is more to our spirit than grim destruction alone. In the hall of heroes, we hold feasts the likes of which you will see nowhere else. To thundering laughter, we raise our horns, tell our sagas, and honour our glorious fallen."

traits.locale_text: "Fakat ruhumuzda zalim yıkımdan daha fazlası vardır. Kahramanlar salonunda senin gibilerin hiçbir yerde göremeyeceği ziyafetler veririz. Gürleyen kahkahalarla boynuzlarımızı havaya kaldırıp destanlarımızı anlatırız ve şanlı ölülerimizi anarız."
